text: læa thæcring cak hmu phwk khea nan mi klum hnung bid lin khxng phwk khea nı kar xan khamphir pheux phwk cea ca di khid wa man ma cak khamphir thang «thi man midi ma cak khamphir læa phwk khea klaw wa man ma cak thi xallxhˌ thang «thi man michı ma ca kxallxhˌ læa phwk khea klaw khwam thec hı kæ xallxhˌ thang «thi phwk khea k ru kan di xyu
